txt_en: May our country prosper and the people live a peaceful life!
txt_cn: 愿祖国繁荣富强，人民安居乐业！

txt_en: Friends are forever.
Optimism is about embracing problems.
txt_cn: 乐观的人，敢于拥抱困难。

txt_en: No obstacle is insurmountable.
Courage is daring to do what is right.
txt_cn: 勇气是敢于去做对的事。

txt_en: True skill is not a blazing flame.
txt_cn: 真本事不是昙花一现的。

txt_en: Joy is the gift of love.
The Cold Dew is the season when pomegranates are ripe.
Everyone is gifted.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己独有的天赋。

txt_en: A mother's love is the strongest love.
txt_cn: 母爱，是世间强大的力量。

txt_en: I'll face the thorns and finally find the blooms.
txt_cn: 我将穿越荆棘，最终寻得花海。

txt_en: Compassion is ethics.
I hope you get to live, and die, as you wish.
Courage is the mastery of fear, not the absence of it.
txt_cn: 勇气是战胜恐惧，而非逃避恐惧。

txt_en: Opportunities are endless.
If you want the rainbow, you have to deal with the rain.
Every journey begins with a first step.
We're going to save our friends!
You fought your way out.
txt_cn: 你闯出了一片自己的天地。

txt_en: Opportunities exist, but only for those who are bold enough to seize them.
txt_cn: 机会是留给那些勇敢抓住它的人。

txt_en: All obstacles will surely be overcome.
txt_cn: 勇往直前，没有过不去的坎。

txt_en: All day, every day, we fight against the current.
txt_cn: 日复一日，我们逆流而上。

txt_en: The sun always shines after a downpour.
When two people love each other, no problem is insurmountable.
I'm with you to the end.
Nothing can stop you.
Water is the softest thing, yet it can penetrate mountains.
We must choose our own destiny!
txt_cn: 我们必须选择我们自己的命运！

txt_en: The real secret to success is patience.
txt_cn: 成功的秘诀就在于耐心。

txt_en: Make hay while the sun is still shining.
